column3: @jonasschnelli I changed it to `amount?`, this is a convention that is already in https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/b83264d9c7a8ddb79f64bd9540caddc8632ef31f/src/test/data/script_tests.json#L2
IMO the amount if optional, maybe we should use `(, amount)`.
Yeah, I didn't know the best way to represent it as optional. We could use a `?` to indicate it is optional which is what regular expressions would do :/
